sk.tsystems.forum.services

Class StatisticsServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.tsystems.forum.services.StatisticsServices

  • public class StatisticsServices
extends java.lang.Object
    StatisticsServices is the class, that contains methods for getting the statistics needed in ForumStatsServlet web application.
    Author:
    martinharcarik

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StatisticsServices() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAdminsCount()
      Gets the amount of instances of User class stored in database, that have the property role set to 'admin'.
      int getAllUsersCount()
      Gets the amount of instances of User class stored in database.
      int getApprovedCount()
      Gets the amount of instances of User class stored in database, that have the property status set to 'confirmed'.
      int getCommentsCount()
      Get the amount of instances of Comment class stored in database.
      User getLatestUser()
      Gets the instance of User, that has the property registeredOn with highest value, or null if there are no instances of User.
      java.lang.String getMostActiveUser()
      Gets the userName property of the instance of User class which has the highest number of instances of Comment class assigned to.
      java.lang.String getMostAnsweredTask()
      Gets the name property of the instance of Task class, that have the highest number of instances of Comment class assigned to or null.
      int getNotApprovedCount()
      Gets the amount of instances of User class stored in database, that have the property status set to 'pending'.
      int getNumberOfCommentsForMostActiveUser()
      Gets the highest number of instances of Comment class assigned to the instance of User class.
      int getNumberOfCommentsForMostAnsweredTask()
      Gets the highest number of instances of Comment class that are assigned to the instance of Task class.
      int getNumberOfTasksForTopic(java.lang.String topic)
      Gets the number of instances of Task class for specified instance of Topic.
      int getPrivateTopicsCount()
      Get the amount of instances of Topic class stored in database, that have the property visibility set to 'private'.
      int getPublicTopicsCount()
      Get the amount of instances of Topic class stored in database, that have the property visibility set to 'public'.
      java.util.List<User> getRegisteredLastWeek()
      Gets the List of instances of User class, that have the property registeredOn set not longer than 7 days ago from the moment of calling the method.
      int getTasksCount()
      Get the amount of instances of Task class stored in database.
      int getTopicsCount()
      Get the amount of instances of Topic class stored in database.
      int getUsersCount()
      Gets the amount of instances of User class stored in database, that have the property role set to 'user'.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public int getAllUsersCount()
        Gets the amount of instances of User class stored in database.
        Returns:
        count of users

      • getAdminsCount

        public int getAdminsCount()
        Gets the amount of instances of User class stored in database, that have the property role set to 'admin'.
        Returns:
        count of administrators

      • getUsersCount

        public int getUsersCount()
        Gets the amount of instances of User class stored in database, that have the property role set to 'user'.
        Returns:
        count of users

      • getApprovedCount

        public int getApprovedCount()
        Gets the amount of instances of User class stored in database, that have the property status set to 'confirmed'.
        Returns:
        count of approved users

      • getNotApprovedCount

        public int getNotApprovedCount()
        Gets the amount of instances of User class stored in database, that have the property status set to 'pending'.
        Returns:
        count of not approved users

      • getTopicsCount

        public int getTopicsCount()
        Get the amount of instances of Topic class stored in database.
        Returns:
        count of topics

      • getTasksCount

        public int getTasksCount()
        Get the amount of instances of Task class stored in database.
        Returns:
        count of tasks

      • getCommentsCount

        public int getCommentsCount()
        Get the amount of instances of Comment class stored in database.
        Returns:
        count of comments

      • getPublicTopicsCount

        public int getPublicTopicsCount()
        Get the amount of instances of Topic class stored in database, that have the property visibility set to 'public'.
        Returns:
        count of public topics

      • getPrivateTopicsCount

        public int getPrivateTopicsCount()
        Get the amount of instances of Topic class stored in database, that have the property visibility set to 'private'.
        Returns:
        count of private topics

      • getMostAnsweredTask

        public java.lang.String getMostAnsweredTask()
        Gets the name property of the instance of Task class, that have the highest number of instances of Comment class assigned to or null.
        Returns:
        name of the task, that have the highest amount of comments assigned to

      • getNumberOfCommentsForMostAnsweredTask

        public int getNumberOfCommentsForMostAnsweredTask()
        Gets the highest number of instances of Comment class that are assigned to the instance of Task class.
        Returns:
        number of comments for task that has the highest amount of comments assigned to

      • getMostActiveUser

        public java.lang.String getMostActiveUser()
        Gets the userName property of the instance of User class which has the highest number of instances of Comment class assigned to.
        Returns:
        name of user, which has the highest number of comments assigned to

      • getNumberOfCommentsForMostActiveUser

        public int getNumberOfCommentsForMostActiveUser()
        Gets the highest number of instances of Comment class assigned to the instance of User class.
        Returns:
        number of comments for user that has the highest amount of comments assigned to

      • getNumberOfTasksForTopic

        public int getNumberOfTasksForTopic(java.lang.String topic)
        Gets the number of instances of Task class for specified instance of Topic. Topic is specified by parameter topic of type String, that represents property topic of class Topic.
        Parameters:
        topic - the name of topic to get amount of tasks for
        Returns:
        number of tasks assigned to specific topic

      • getLatestUser

        public User getLatestUser()
        Gets the instance of User, that has the property registeredOn with highest value, or null if there are no instances of User.
        Returns:
        User, that has registered as last or null, if there are no users to select from

      • getRegisteredLastWeek

        public java.util.List<User> getRegisteredLastWeek()
        Gets the List of instances of User class, that have the property registeredOn set not longer than 7 days ago from the moment of calling the method. Property's registeredOn type is Date.
        Returns:
        list of users that have registered not longer than a week ago from the moment of calling the method
